lead_paragraph: A prisons official said the inmates appear to have been killed by other inmates, but it was unclear whether they were targeted because they were serving terms for sex crimes against children.

headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Plains; Nebraska: Prison Riot Inquiry Yields Few Answers
headline.main: Investigation Into Deadly Nebraska Prison Riot Yields Few Answers

snippet: A prisons official said the inmates appear to have been killed by other inmates, but it was unclear whether they were targeted because they were serving terms for sex crimes against children.
abstract: Nebraska Dept of Correctional Services says two prisoners who died in riot at Tecumseh State Correctional Institution seem to have been killed by other inmates; two prisoners were convicted of sex crimes against children, although it is unclear if that was motive.
